title: Does anyone remember the Karan Johar's bollywood documentary on History TV18 and how can one watch it now?
selftext:
Ok,  so when I watched the romantics (that bollywood documentary on netflix  for someone living under the rock and doesn't know yet), I couldn't help  but reminisce of something similar where a lot of bollywood stars came  and talked about bollywood trends and history. After a lot of googling, I  now know it was called 'Bollywood@100' and Karan Johar hosted it.

[A news article for reference if anyone needs](https://www.tellychakkar.com/tv/tv-news/karan-johar-excited-he-relives-100-years-of-cinema-history-tv18)

[I was also able to find the trailer here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IV9cQy6pqSA)

So  yeah, I remember it being really informative and fun and it wasn't as  much just for the chopra's but the history of bollywood as a whole. Does  anyone know where I can find it to stream now? I tried to find everyone  but to no avail. It's like everyone just forgot about it, I had a very  tough time just finding the name of it.

I wanna watch it again fr ;\~;
comments: Yeah me too I have been looking for it for years now. Did you find it?
No man, couldn't find it anywhere :'(
